Title: Buy Patel Engineering; target of Rs 80: ICICI Direct
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 06:35
Related Stocks: RELIANCE, ICICI
Categories: general

Summary:
ICICI Direct is bullish on Patel Engineering recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 80 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
